permissions: Allowed for admins or users authorized to update the related customer.
validation_notes: Requires a customer certification type ID argument. At least one of --customer or --certification-type must be provided; provided values cannot be empty. The certification type must belong to the customer's broker.

flags.name: --certification-type
flags.validation: When set, must be a non-empty certification type ID

flags.name: --customer
flags.validation: When set, must be a non-empty customer ID
